transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello, hi sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning, kaun bol rahe hain?
Executive: Sir, Hemant baat kar raha tha sir, senior manager IndiaMART se. Abhi aapki baat karai thi maine Meenakshi se sir. Aapne complaint kiya tha na Rahul ke against mein ki WhatsApp pe response nahi kar rahe hain.
Customer: Office mein koi madam phone ki thi.
Executive: Haan, haan sir, haan sir, haan, main unka senior baat kar raha hu. Main ye keh raha tha ki sir Rahul ko aapke account manager se change kar raha hu. Maine Meenakshi ko hi call karaya tha. Main unko aapka ye data de de raha hu sir handle karne ke liye, right sir.
Customer: Uska response hi nahi hai, ab main kya hi bol sakta hu.
Executive: Nahi, nahi sir, aapne maine dekha WhatsApp pe screenshot dala tha ki haan 17 tarikh ko aapne message kiya tha unko.
Customer: Main abhi ek aur screenshot bhejunga, wo raat ko 11:30 baje message kar raha hai.
Executive: Raat mein sir unhone jab dekha hoga tab kiya hoga. Main usko bol dunga isliye main change kar de raha hu sir. Main sorry bolta hu, unko bol dunga main agli baar se agle aur bhi client ko aisa na kare ki jab message aa raha hai available hai tabhi kar le, raat ko reply na kare ya phir subah kar le.
Customer: Subah karne mein koi dikkat nahi hai. Ha, subah karne mein nahi hai sir. At least maan lijiye koi aapka customer agar kahi cheez mein phasa hai, at least urgently message bol raha hai call karne ke liye to do minute ke liye to free rehta hai aadmi.
Executive: Bilkul sir, bilkul sir. Agar wo message dekh liye hain, main samajh gaya sir agar message mil gaya agar dekh le to ignore karne ka koi matlab nahi banta. Agar by chance message hi nahi dekha to baat alag hai. But agar dekh liya double tick bhi ho raha hai. Saturday Sunday off rehta hai, main Monday unko contact karunga. Bas simple si baat hai, main bhi disturb nahi karunga unko.
Customer: Haan, aur utni bhi koi badi baat kya hi ho sakti hai sir. Matlab mujhe nahi samajh mein aata itni badi kya baat ho sakti hai. Aap bhi kya hi bologe?
Executive: Bahut bologe service ke related bologe ki haan ye dikkat aa gayi, buyer response nahi kar raha aur kya hi baat ho sakti hai.
Customer: Problem kya hua tha na, ek jo buyer hai, wo raat ko phone kar raha tha. Ha, raat ko phone kar raha tha jab uska profile open kijiyega to char panch baar phone kiya aur hamare paas call aaya hi nahi wo.
Executive: Wo nahi aayega sir aapne raat ka night non working time ka band kiya hua sir aapne.
Customer: Nahi, on hai. On hai sir aap check kar sakte hain.
Executive: Accha, accha ek baar dekh leta hu sir. Ab miscall tak nahi aaya mere paas aur waha pe customer one star rating deke chala gaya. Ab main call kar raha hu, main apne number se office ke number se call to response nahi kar raha customer. Even WhatsApp pe bhi maine kiya, no response.
Customer: Ab bataiye is tarah se agar koi customer is tarah se rating dega to impact padega sir haan, bilkul sir.
Executive: Impact to padega chaliye thik hai lekin customer call kar raha hai to hamare paas to aana chahiye na call.
Executive: To dekh leta hu ek baar technical team se glitch ka dekh leta hu ho sakta hai. Kyunki iske pehle bhi mere paas bahut sare issue hua hai ye aur ye maine already Rahul ji ko bataya tha.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Unhone bola tha ki sir ye solution ho chuka hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Bas thik hai main ek baar dal deta hu sir aur aur bhi call aati hai na sir aisa to nahi na bas wo call aapki nahi aapke paas to hai baki sare calls aapke paas.
Executive: Mere paas haan, haan aati hai. Kal bhi aapka 100% aapka response rate bhi hai aap call miss bhi nahi karte ho aapke paas is month mein to abhi do hi call aayi hai pichle month mein aapko 67 calls aayi thi aapne 57 call receive kiya tha. To call to aap proper receive kar rahe ho sir usme koi dikkat nahi hai response rate bhi aapka sahi hai.
Customer: Accha thik hai sir main account manager aapka change kar dunga.
Customer: Call clear nahi laga lekin wo dekh raha hu ki teen char baar customer call kiya hai.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Aur us time nahi laga to obviously koi bhi one star deke chala jayega rare usko phone hi nahi lagta ye logo ka.
Executive: Samajh gaya, samajh gaya sir. WhatsApp pe bhi connect kiya tha unko WhatsApp pe bhi reply nahi kiya aapko?
Customer: Maine WhatsApp pe bhi maine unko details bhi share kiya jiska inquiry kiya tha maine call bhi kiya tha no response customer ka.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir. Aap boliyega to main wo screenshot bhej deta hu.
Executive: Nahi, nahi uski jarurat nahi padegi aap bol rahe ho to aap ye screenshot ki need nahi padegi baki main aisa dekho main do cheez aapke kar deta hu pehle aapka account manager turant change kar deta hu Meenakshi ji hai wahi rahengi main unko bol deta hu wo WhatsApp pe aapke connect kar le. Ye kafi experience bhi hai unko.
Customer: Bilkul sir product line ke bare mein jankari.
Customer: Customer se puch lijiye problem kya hua hai jo one star.
Executive: Bilkul sir main customer ko maine phone karaya tha aapne shayad Meenakshi ko number wagera diya Meenakshi bol rahi thi unhone bhi connect kiya unko. Haan, thik hai. To unhone response nahi kiya baki main iske liye main ye kar sakta hu sir main apne jo hamari team hoti hai backend wali team unko main ticket raise karta hu aapke review rating ko lekar ki ek baar client se baat karte ho hota kya hai ki review rating unnecessary koi de deta hai.
Customer: Is tarah se mere paas one star jo bhi customer aaye hain na, wo wahi customer diye hain jinka call connect nahi hua hai. Aap dekh sakte hain. Aur maine phir idhar se callback kiya ya to unka number band mila hai aur nahi to number wrong bata raha hai aur nahi to wo response nahi kar rahe hain. Aap dekh sakte hain koi bhi client jo one star rating diya uska wahi same issue hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya ye. Thik hai baki main ye review rating ke team ko dal deta hu sir thik hai. Ye dekho sir last month October mein jo bhi aapke paas aaye honge October mein pura nahi keh sakta par last seven days ka hamare paas hota hai main team ko dal dunga. Wo team ek baar customer se baat karne ki koshish karegi ki haan aapne kyu diya agar genuine reason hoga ki haan baat hui product nahi hua ya phir aapne kuch hua to dekh ke wo review hat jata hai sir thik hai. To aap uske liye pareshan mat hoiye. Thik hai main ticket raise unko kar deta hu. Ek aur jo uske pehle ek aur jo koi customer one star diya tha maine usse baat kiya tha. Wo kya bol rahe ki sir maine to IndiaMART khola bhi nahi IndiaMART kya hota hai mere ko pata bhi nahi hai. To koi dusra koi mera phone use kiya hoga aur one star deke chala gaya hoga. Maine bola at least hata dijiye sir. Wo log mere ko nahi aata hai. Ab main kya bolu usko bataiye. Ab usko koi aap bhi kya hi bolna aata aisa nahi ki aata nahi hoga unhone utna karna nahi chahte honge aap guide karte to wo jarur ho jata. But thik hai but aapne main dekh raha hu sir aapne turant reply bhi kiya hai ki hello sir we try to connect multiple times but you are not responding our calls please let me aapne unko reward bhi kiya hai. Rehan Salwar Mewati hai na? Haan. Thik hai main iske liye sir dal deta hu aapka ye dono concern ho jayega resolve aapka account manager to main abhi change kar dunga. Dusra sir main aapke behalf pe hi apne team ko lekar apne jo hamari backend team hoti hai unko dalta hu ek baar customer se connect karke usko resolve kare thik hai sir. Thik hai. Aur koi issue sir aur main kuch kar sakta hu aapke liye? Nahi. Thik hai baki sir ye aapko pata hoga sir ye feedback jayega aapne jo concern raise kiya tha to please feedback jarur dijiyega sir thik hai. Thik hai thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer call not connecting, impacting ratings.

- Rahul not responding on WhatsApp at night.



Resolution:

- Account manager changed to Meenakshi.

- Ticket raised for review rating issue.

- Backend team will connect to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, ratings, technical issue, whatsapp
